alert.note: Alert for Cimarron (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Cimarron County through 515 PM CDT... At 415 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Felt, or 12 miles west of Boise City, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Boise City, Keyes, Griggs and Felt. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
